_header: In bale be blithe for that is best
Title(s): ‘In baill be blyth for it is best’
_description: ‘In baill be blyth for it is best’ — five 8-line stanzas with this refrain

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
In baill be blyth for þat is bestin barret gif þow be
                    bowne to byd…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…of this mater I mak ane endIn bayl be blyth for þat Is
                    best
